LanguageData.AteReplicatedMeal.stages.0.label: 吃了替代食物
LanguageData.AteReplicatedMeal.stages.0.description: I ate a Replicated Meal. It wasn't fancy, but it was filling!
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.0.label: ate fine meal
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.0.description: I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.stages.0.label: ate lavish meal
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.stages.0.description: That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul。
LanguageData.AteLuxuryMeal.stages.0.label: 吃了豪华大餐
LanguageData.AteLuxuryMeal.stages.0.description: That luxury meal was amazing! It nourished my body and my soul。
LanguageData.AteCannedMeal.stages.0.label: 吃了罐装食物
LanguageData.AteCannedMeal.stages.0.description: I had to eat canned meal. It gives a metallic taste。
LanguageData.AteCatFood.stages.0.label: 吃了猫粮
LanguageData.AteCatFood.stages.0.description: I had to eat cat food. What kind of colony is this where we feed the cats first, and the colonists later?
LanguageData.AteSoylentGreen.stages.0.label: 吃了营养质
LanguageData.AteSoylentGreen.stages.0.description: I ate Soylent Green made from the meat of another human. This is bad。
LanguageData.AteRawShimmershroom.stages.0.label: 吃了生蘑菇
LanguageData.AteRawShimmershroom.stages.0.description: I ate a delicious mushroom. It tastes so good!
LanguageData.BreathedGleamcapSmoke.stages.0.label: 闪帽迷醉
LanguageData.BreathedGleamcapSmoke.stages.0.descripti: I breathed a strange smoke from a Gleamcap. I am feeling so good!
LanguageData.AtePie.stages.0.label: 吃了派
LanguageData.AtePie.stages.0.description: I ate a really tasty pie. It's not a lie!
LanguageData.AteCandy.stages.0.label: 吃了糖果
LanguageData.AteCandy.stages.0.description: I ate a really tasty candy. Now I'm sugar buzzed。
LanguageData.Hotdrink.stages.0.label: 热饮料
LanguageData.Hotdrink.stages.0.description: I drank a really nice hot drink, now I feel better。
LanguageData.HadTea.stages.0.label: 一杯好茶
LanguageData.HadTea.stages.0.description: Tea is tasty! I like this。
LanguageData.HadFruitDrink.stages.0.label: 水果饮料
LanguageData.HadFruitDrink.stages.0.description: That fruit drink was so healthy! I'm feeling good now。
LanguageData.SilentJawThought.stages.0.label: 静音颌
LanguageData.SilentJawThought.stages.0.description: I just want to talk but I can't. It's so horrible!
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.0.label: Buzzed (Hidden)
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.1.label: 难喝
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.1.description: I feel slightly better but the taste is just awful。
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.2.label: 感觉好点了
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.3.label: 不痛了
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.3.description: There's no pain anymore, it's great!
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.4.label: 过量
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.4.description: Uhh! I see funny shapes everywhere!
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.5.label: 超量
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.stages.5.description: I feel like I'm flying! Please don't wake me up!
LanguageData.HadMedicalDrink.stages.0.label: 感觉好多了
